resources.string: Click ok to proceed or cancel to Retake image.

The Search function take in 1 or 2 biometric images, uses a pretrained machine learning model to make predictions for each other, then uses a voting method to determine which prediction is correct. If the number of images is greater than 1, the search function perform a vote, where a plurality algorithm determine the correct subject.

You can also choose images from the gallery Go to a directory of your choosing and select picture with faces. Once the Entrollment or Search actions commence, if any images are not suitable for processing, a message is given and images are automatically removed.

Our enrollment interface is configured to link Personally identifiable Information (PII) to an unencrypted biometric input. All downstream processing is on encrypted biometrics. The enrollment interface is configured to trigger deletion of the unencrypted biometric information.
When you select the Enroll me button then this screen will be open. You will have to fill the information in it and then press next button
This app demonstrates the usage of CameraView. In order to do that, it needs permission to access camera.
Camera app cannot do anything without camera permission.
error : Pictures are not taken in correct way. Make sure sure your images are taken correctly
Do you want to view PII for this entrollment
You have been enrolled successfully, please login to view your PII for this enrollment.
Access to the camera is needed for detection
This application cannot run because it does not have the camera permission. The application will now exit.
Face detector dependencies cannot be downloaded due to low device storage
Your face is too close to camera
Your face is very far to camera
Your face is not in camera area
There are more than 1 faces detected
